tool_description: This API fetches funny posts from various sites around the web and makes them available for you to integrate on your blog, or whatever else you want to do with them.
name: Programmer Humor
title: Programmer Humor

api_list.name: Get Top 5 Latest Posts from Reddit
api_list.description: This endpoint will return the top 5 posts, uploaded today. These are sorted by upvotes.

api_list.name: Get latest 10 posts from 9gag
api_list.description:
Looks for any of these tags
'programming', 'coding', 'code', 'tech', 'developer', 'webdev', 'web-dev'
